projects.title: Manifestare - Comprehensive Business Suite
projects.description: Architected and built from scratch a comprehensive business suite for small businesses, featuring CMS, analytics, event management, donations, email campaigns, social media posting, and a form builder. Designed for high performance and scalability to support continuous growth.

projects.title: Prumote - Digital Advertising Platform
projects.description: Developed from the ground up a digital advertising platform that simplifies ad creation, media planning, and buying with built-in analytics and user role management.

projects.title: AuthCMS - AI-Powered CMS
projects.description: Designed and developed end-to-end an AI-powered CMS with advanced content editing, page and collection management, and a modular architecture for flexible layouts. Integrated performance best practices to ensure millisecond page loads.

projects.title: Fest Template Framework
projects.description: Created a custom framework that powers AuthCMS, enabling editable elements and dynamic rendering strategies for seamless, high-speed content delivery.

projects.title: CommerceBee - Full-Stack E-commerce Solution
projects.description: Engineered a full-stack e-commerce solution with a no-code CMS, allowing stores to launch in minutes while achieving lightning-fast page rendering.

projects.title: Timely - SaaS Scheduling Platform
projects.description: Built and deployed a SaaS scheduling platform that streamlines appointments and resource management with real-time updates and role-based access.

projects.title: FundFaster - Investment Management Platform
projects.description: Designed and implemented a team-based savings and investment management platform with real-time tracking and collaborative financial planning tools.

projects.title: bdwatch.live - Community Accountability Platform
projects.description: Led development of a community-driven, map-based accountability platform promoting public transparency and safety reporting.

projects.title: Fantasy Sniper - Sports Community Platform
projects.description: A community where fans connect with their team, compete with other fans and earn rewards for demonstrating fan skill.

projects.title: Nicole Dennis-Benn - NY Times Bestselling Author
projects.description: The website for Nicole Dennis-Benn, NY Times Bestselling Author, serves as an online platform to showcase her literary works, share her biography, connect with readers, and provide updates on her latest publications and events.

projects.title: Morning Dew Therapy
projects.description: A website for therapeutic services, offering information, resources, and a platform for clients to connect with mental health professionals.
